Header: Canadian High Commissioner Calls at SFHQ-J
Content: H.E David Mckinnon, High Commissioner of Canada in Sri Lanka called at the Security Force Headquarters - Jaffna and met Major General Dharshana Hettiarrachchi, Commander, Security Forces - Jaffna on Tuesday (4). During the official meeting, the Security Force Commander briefed the envoy on the present security situation in the Jaffna Peninsula and participation of the Army in the nation-building and resettlement programmes led by the Sri Lanka Army in the Northern Province. A few officials of the High Commission of Canada in Sri Lanka and several Senior Army Officers were also present during the meeting.
